hero.title: Thompson
hero.subtitle: Window film
hero.description: Protection films safeguard your car from external impacts, dust, dirt, stones, and other hazards.

features.title: Why Thompson?
features.description: Protect your vehicle with professional protection films

items.title: Protection
items.description: Protection films shield your car from external impacts, dust, dirt, harmful substances, stones, and other hazards.

items.title: Aesthetic Appearance
items.description: Automotive films help improve your car's appearance, giving it a new, modern, and attractive look.

items.title: UV Protection
items.description: Films protect your car's paint from ultraviolet (UV) rays, preventing paint fading.

items.title: Interior Protection
items.description: When applied to windows, automotive films protect the interior from heat and UV rays, maintaining a comfortable cabin temperature.

items.title: Cost Savings
items.description: Automotive and protection films help car owners reduce repair and painting costs.

items.title: Privacy
items.description: Films used for window tinting reduce the visibility of the car's interior from outside.

items.title: Protection Film
items.description: Nearly invisible urethane film. Protects your car's paint from unwanted damage and maximizes resale value. Features self-healing properties, stain resistance, and high optical clarity.

items.title: Automotive Film
items.description: Adds protection and style to your car! Provides sun protection, privacy, and attractive appearance. Keep your car looking new and give it a modern look.

items.title: Technology
items.description: Protect your car from scratches, dust, and UV rays with new protection film technology. Keep your car looking brand new!

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions? We're ready to help you
